comments:
Build ID: Build id: 1.0.0.200611131

Steps To Reproduce:
I get a SWTException when closing the properties view via the OK button for a given database connection. 

Steps---
-In the datasource explorer view, right click and select properties
-do nothing to the form and click OK
-notice this exception in the PDE runtime error log view.
